title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description: When setting a filter like "row[0] equals to 0", the data set either returns incorrect results or null result set.
OB: When setting a filter expression using "row[0] equals to <value>", the first result record is returned when previewing the data set.
EB: An error message should be displayed indicating that the filter expression is invalid.
SR:
1. Open the data set configuration
2. Set a filter using the expression "row[0] equals to <value>"
3. Click on the Preview tab

Expected Result: An error message should be displayed indicating that the filter expression is invalid.
